hero.title: Abysstech
hero.subtitle: Decentralized Anonymous Communication
hero.description: A fully anonymous, decentralized communication platform built on Solana blockchain

product.title: Secure Communication for the Digital Age
product.description: Abysstech provides a revolutionary communication platform that ensures complete anonymity and privacy through advanced encryption and blockchain technology.

features.title: Complete Anonymity
features.description: Our platform ensures that your identity remains completely anonymous, with no data collection or tracking.

features.title: Decentralized Infrastructure
features.description: Built on Solana blockchain, our platform operates without central servers, making it resistant to censorship and control.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: All communications are protected with military-grade encryption, ensuring that only intended recipients can access your messages.

features.title: Blockchain Verification
features.description: Message integrity is verified through blockchain technology, preventing tampering or manipulation.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.description: Our ABYSS token is the foundation of our ecosystem, providing governance rights and platform utility.

categories.name: Community & Ecosystem
categories.description: Reserved for community incentives, ecosystem growth, and user rewards

categories.name: Team & Advisors
categories.description: Allocated to team members and advisors with 2-year vesting period

categories.name: Development Fund
categories.description: Dedicated to ongoing platform development and technical improvements

categories.name: Private Sale
categories.description: Distributed to early investors with 1-year vesting period

categories.name: Public Sale
categories.description: Available for public token sale participants

categories.name: Liquidity Provision
categories.description: Allocated for exchange liquidity and market stability

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A group of privacy advocates, blockchain experts, and security specialists committed to creating a truly anonymous communication platform.

members.name: Alexander Wright

community.title: Join Our Community
